00011 struct b3Aabb
00012 {
00013         union
00014         {
00015                 float m_min[4];
00016                 b3Float4 m_minVec;
00017                 int m_minIndices[4];
00018         };
00019         union
00020         {
00021                 float   m_max[4];
00022                 b3Float4 m_maxVec;
00023                 int m_signedMaxIndices[4];

00027 inline void b3TransformAabb2(b3Float4ConstArg localAabbMin,b3Float4ConstArg localAabbMax, float margin,
00028                                                 b3Float4ConstArg pos,
00029                                                 b3QuatConstArg orn,
00030                                                 b3Float4* aabbMinOut,b3Float4* aabbMaxOut)
00031 {
00032                 b3Float4 localHalfExtents = 0.5f*(localAabbMax-localAabbMin);
00033                 localHalfExtents+=b3MakeFloat4(margin,margin,margin,0.f);
00034                 b3Float4 localCenter = 0.5f*(localAabbMax+localAabbMin);
00035                 b3Mat3x3 m;
00036                 m = b3QuatGetRotationMatrix(orn);
00037                 b3Mat3x3 abs_b = b3AbsoluteMat3x3(m);
00038                 b3Float4 center = b3TransformPoint(localCenter,pos,orn);
00039                 
00040                 b3Float4 extent = b3MakeFloat4(b3Dot3F4(localHalfExtents,b3GetRow(abs_b,0)),
00041                                                                                  b3Dot3F4(localHalfExtents,b3GetRow(abs_b,1)),
00042                                                                                  b3Dot3F4(localHalfExtents,b3GetRow(abs_b,2)),
00043                                                                                  0.f);
00044                 *aabbMinOut = center-extent;
00045                 *aabbMaxOut = center+extent;
00046 }
00047 
00049 inline bool b3TestAabbAgainstAabb(b3Float4ConstArg aabbMin1,b3Float4ConstArg aabbMax1,
00050                                                                 b3Float4ConstArg aabbMin2, b3Float4ConstArg aabbMax2)
00051 {
00052         bool overlap = true;
00053         overlap = (aabbMin1.x > aabbMax2.x || aabbMax1.x < aabbMin2.x) ? false : overlap;
00054         overlap = (aabbMin1.z > aabbMax2.z || aabbMax1.z < aabbMin2.z) ? false : overlap;
00055         overlap = (aabbMin1.y > aabbMax2.y || aabbMax1.y < aabbMin2.y) ? false : overlap;
00056         return overlap;
00057 }
